001package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
010import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
011import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.ZoomMeeting;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service.ZoomMeetingRepository;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
015import java.util.Date;
016import java.util.List;
017import javax.inject.Inject;
018import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
019
020@HiltViewModel
021public class ZoomMeetingViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
022
023  private static final long MILLISECONDS_PER_MONTH = 30L * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;
024  private final ZoomMeetingRepository repository;
025  private final MutableLiveData<Long> zoomMeetingId;
026  private final LiveData<ZoomMeeting> zoomMeeting;
027  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
028  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
029
030  @Inject
031  ZoomMeetingViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, ZoomMeetingRepository repository) {
032    this.repository = repository;
033    this.zoomMeetingId = new MutableLiveData<>();
034    this.zoomMeeting = new MutableLiveData<>();
035    this.throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
036    this.pending = new CompositeDisposable();
037//    connect();
038    fetchMeetings();
039//    fetchDetails(821_3179_6284L);
040  }
041
042  private void connect() {
043    repository.authenticate()
044        .subscribe(
045            (auth) -> Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), auth.toString()),
046            this::postThrowable,
047            pending
048        );
049  }
050
051  public void fetchMeetings() {
052    Date to = new Date();
053    Date from = new Date(to.getTime() - MILLISECONDS_PER_MONTH);
054    repository.observeMeetings(from, to)
055        .subscribe(
056            () ->
057                Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), "Meetings Recorded"),
058            this::postThrowable,
059            pending
060        );
061  }
062
063  public void fetchDetails(long meetingId) {
064    repository.fetchMeeting(meetingId)
065        .subscribe();
066  }
067
068  public LiveData<Long> getZoomMeetingId() {
069    return zoomMeetingId;
070  }
071
072  public LiveData<ZoomMeeting> getZoomMeeting() {
073    return zoomMeeting;
074  }
075
076  public LiveData<List<ZoomMeeting>> getZoomMeetings() {
077    return repository.get();
078  }
079
080  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
081    return throwable;
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public void onStop(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
086    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
087    pending.clear();
088  }
089
090  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
091    Log.e(getClass().getSimpleName(), throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
092  }
093}
